languages.text: "Тайна места последнего упокоения моей покровительницы раскрыта. Я чувствую... покой. Какое удивительное, светлое чувство".
"The mystery of my patroness's final resting place has been solved. I feel... at peace. What an amazing, radiant feeling."
languages.original_text: "Тайна места последнего упокоения моей покровительницы раскрыта. Я чувствую... покой. Какое удивительное, светлое чувство".

traits.locale_text: "The mystery of my patroness's final resting place has been solved. I feel...at peace. What an amazing, radiant feeling."
"The mystery of my patroness's final resting place has been solved. I feel...at peace. What an amazing, radiant feeling."
"The mystery of my patroness's final resting place has been solved. I feel...at peace. What an amazing, radiant feeling."
"The mystery of my patroness's final resting place has been solved. I feel...at peace. What an amazing, radiant feeling."

languages.text: “藏在我守护神安息之地的秘密被解开了，我感觉到了……安宁。这种喜悦真是美妙。”
languages.original_text: "The mystery of my patroness's final resting place has been solved. I feel... at peace. What an amazing, radiant feeling."

traits.locale_text: “藏在我守护神安息之地的秘密被解开了，我感觉到了……安宁。这种喜悦真是美妙。”

languages.text: « Maintenant que le mystère du lieu où repose à jamais ma bienfaitrice est résolu, je me sens... en paix. Quel sentiment incroyable ! »
languages.original_text: "The mystery of my patroness's final resting place has been solved. I feel... at peace. What an amazing, radiant feeling."

traits.locale_text: « Maintenant que le mystère du lieu où repose à jamais ma bienfaitrice est résolu, je me sens... en paix. Quel sentiment incroyable ! »

languages.text: «Por fin queda resuelto el misterio del lugar de descanso final de mi patrona. Me siento... en paz. Es una sensación increíble y luminosa».
languages.original_text: "The mystery of my patroness's final resting place has been solved. I feel... at peace. What an amazing, radiant feeling."

traits.locale_text: «Por fin queda resuelto el misterio del lugar de descanso final de mi patrona. Me siento... en paz. Es una sensación increíble y luminosa».

languages.text: 「私の守護霊が最後に眠る場所の謎が解けた。私は…穏やかな気分だ。なんて素晴らしい、晴れやかな気分なんだろう」
languages.original_text: "The mystery of my patroness's final resting place has been solved. I feel... at peace. What an amazing, radiant feeling."

traits.locale_text: 「私の守護霊が最後に眠る場所の謎が解けた。私は…穏やかな気分だ。なんて素晴らしい、晴れやかな気分なんだろう」

languages.text: "Das Mysterium der letzten Ruhestätte meiner Patronin wurde endlich gelöst. Ich fühle mich ... friedlich. Was für ein unglaubliches, strahlendes Gefühl."
languages.original_text: "The mystery of my patroness's final resting place has been solved. I feel... at peace. What an amazing, radiant feeling."

traits.locale_text: "Das Mysterium der letzten Ruhestätte meiner Patronin wurde endlich gelöst. Ich fühle mich ... friedlich. Was für ein unglaubliches, strahlendes Gefühl."

languages.original_text: "The mystery of my patroness's final resting place has been solved. I feel...at peace. What an amazing, radiant feeling."

languages.text: "Efendimin ebedî istirahatgâhı hakkındaki gizem çözüldü. İçim rahatladı. Ne kadar da harika ve şen bir hismiş."
languages.original_text: "The mystery of my patroness's final resting place has been solved. I feel... at peace. What an amazing, radiant feeling."

traits.locale_text: "Efendimin ebedî istirahatgâhı hakkındaki gizem çözüldü. İçim rahatladı. Ne kadar da harika ve şen bir his."
